tool_description: Amazon Product Scrapping  is used for amazon product scraping to get detailed  information, reviews, offers and searching of products.
title: Amazon Product Scrapping

api_list.name: Get Product Reviews

product.name: Amazon Essentials Men's Duck Bib Quilt Lined Overall, Black, 30W x 32L

top_positive_review.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
top_positive_review.title: No brainer for the price
top_positive_review.review: I purchased these for outdoor manual labour (clearing brush, chainsaw work, splitting wood, etc). I'd initially planned to go with Carhartt, but I saw a pair of these in roughly my size for $20. No brainer.I can't speak to their longevity yet, but I'm pretty impressed by the toughness and thickness of the material. I cleared out a lot of dense thorny brush today and had no issues with anything penetrating through to my legs.Women- if you're looking for something that doesn't make you look like a potato, look elsewhere. They're definitely cut for men, and seem to be beer-gut friendly. I couldn't care less about how I look, so they're fine by me, but yeah, you've been warned. I'm 5'9", 145#, fairly hourglass figure, and ordered a 33x29. Definitely could go to a 32x30 at least, but for $20 (thanks, Amazon pricing algorithm!) I'm just fine in my burlap sack. If you're looking for that " cute ironic city dweller" look, find something cut for women.TBD on shrinkage, I plan to wash on cold and air dry, but if there are any issues I'll update this review.

top_critical_review.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
top_critical_review.title: Too Big then Broken.
top_critical_review.review: To begin with, this item only has a waist and leg length measurement.When i first received them: I found that it was a little long in the leg but extremely loose on the torso, even when I took the straps all the way up. The straps are honestly too short to allow for any meaningful adjustment if you have a short to normal torso. So, I exchanged it for a small size to see if that would help.When the exchange came in:The leg length was perfect. The torso had not changed AT ALL, despite the fact that I taken the waist measurement down TWO sizes. The strap, (as shown in the pictures) was broken which also meant it wouldn’t stay on. The straps are sewn in a way that you can’t undo it to fix yourself without tearing it up.Overall:If you have a long torso congrats you’ll be fine otherwise look elsewhere, and if you exchange it be ready to receive a broken replacement. The material was really nice though, which just made me more disappointed that the fit was poor.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
reviews.title: No brainer for the price
reviews.review: I purchased these for outdoor manual labour (clearing brush, chainsaw work, splitting wood, etc). I'd initially planned to go with Carhartt, but I saw a pair of these in roughly my size for $20. reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
reviews.title: Good for the price
reviews.review: I feel the material is tougher than the other brands. Size is right.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
reviews.title: Better Pockets Than My Carharts
reviews.review: I bought these for the price to supplement a pair of Carhart of the same design, color , etc but actually  prefer the  pockets on this pair . Other than that they are so similar , down to the waist being a little snug against my big belly . I will say the crotch is slightly more generous to my family jewels when I'm sitting but still not as friendly as a pair of sweat pants . The screwdriver pockets on the sides being straight across helps tremendously with snagging on roller system sides vs the slanted on my Carharts . The hand pockets on my Carharts feel like they are just wrong , like hands warmer pockets that are useless for anything else . Not so with these . I can put my car keys in my  pocket, sit down and they don't poke me in the stomach with the Amazon Essentials . If the hammer holder on the left side gets caught on the rollers I mentioned before , that's an easy fix , especially since I won't be hanging anything from it .The clasps on both are the same design but the AE ones work so much easier , as if the slot is a little wider and bend a little less angled . I also prefer the dull brass to the nickel color of the Carharts .I doubt I'll be zipping either pair up the legs so the difference between lengths (knee vs upper thigh ) is not something I'll like or dislike . All other zippers seem apples to apples . The insulation seems spot on the same to me but time will tell if one works here than the other .Both are 30" inseam and are about 1/2" too long . Amazon offers a 29" (or other specific length ) in every waist size whereas Carhart offers nothing shorter than 30" , no matter the waist size . Finding a 40x30 reminded me of when I was a kid and jeans were available in a plethora of size combos , no matter the brand or size .If I were to get another pair of these and was not on my way down in weight and belly girth I'd suggest others with a "barrel chest" go 2 sizes up from their normal relaxed fit pants size .If they had an elastic area at the waist ,like Walls and Carhart do , they'd be a 5+ but not having that makes it more difficult to be comfortable when I'm layered more than 2 shirts underneath .Edit . I bought another pair in a larger waist size and they are night/day more comfortable on my belly . I also have spilled coffee on them and it soaked through like a sponge when it gets saturated so these are definitely NOT water repellent like Carhart and Walls . Maybe Scotchgard , or some other product , may help with that but these are not something I'll be wearing in the snow  .

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2021
reviews.title: Quality at a great price
reviews.review: Can't compare these lined bib overalls to Carhartt because they're not Carhartt. But, they are quality made, comfortable fit, and solid build for an amazing price. This is what Amazon Basics / Amazon Essentials should be doing... making our basic needs easier to purchase, more affordable, and simpler take advantage of for everyday life.The fit for me was spot on for what I expected. I wear my jeans slightly on the tight-side. I order Wrangler jeans at 36W and these overalls give me a little room over how I normally wear my jeans. I order jeans at 32 inseam (length) and these give me a little additional length and cover boot top while seated. That's a great fit for overalls. So, for me, I ordered what I wear every day and they fit good. --- If you want room for more clothing underneath then order accordingly.If your belly overhangs your waist, remember these are overalls and the belly size of the overalls is the same measurement as the waist... your true waist is at your navel. Might be worth measuring before ordering. Cheers!

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
reviews.title: Too Big then Broken.
reviews.review: To begin with, this item only has a waist and leg length measurement.When i first received them: I found that it was a little long in the leg but extremely loose on the torso, even when I took the straps all the way up. The straps are honestly too short to allow for any meaningful adjustment if you have a short to normal torso. So, I exchanged it for a small size to see if that would help.When the exchange came in:The leg length was perfect. The torso had not changed AT ALL, despite the fact that I taken the waist measurement down TWO sizes. The strap, (as shown in the pictures) was broken which also meant it wouldn’t stay on. The straps are sewn in a way that you can’t undo it to fix yourself without tearing it up.Overall:If you have a long torso congrats you’ll be fine otherwise look elsewhere, and if you exchange it be ready to receive a broken replacement. The material was really nice though, which just made me more disappointed that the fit was poor.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2021
reviews.title: So far so good. Big footprint and dirt washed out.
reviews.review: Came with the dirt and debris pictured.Worn them a few times and no problem. Pockets are useful. Decently warm but not too much since it's the pant part only that is insulated.The right leg pocket is not so useful as a utility knife pocket as it's more cell phone size that quick knife. Some of you know what I'm talking about. Good for a pair of large vise grips or channel locks but you have to dig for a knife or screwdriver.The strap clasps/hooks are not as annoying as the new Carhart ones (that are terrible) but still not as good as the button style that worked for a hundred years.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2021
reviews.title: Just unboxed, so far perfect
reviews.review: It will take a little time to see how they hold up, but so far I am more than pleased with these. The fit is perfect and the quality seems very good, especially at half the cost of Carhartt. Nice and thick insulation and reinforced stress points. Look forward to putting these to use.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2021
reviews.title: CARHART Quality... maybe
reviews.review: Time will tell, but this has the feel and fit of what you'd expect from Carhart products. So I'm pretty happy with it. I got a size bigger then what I usually wear b/c I will be putting it over cloths and worked perfectly.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2021
reviews.title: Durable I think
reviews.review: they look durable and fit good they should handle the test of time I hope . Ask me about April of 2023.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2021
reviews.title: Impressive value
reviews.review: I wear 34wx30l in jeans.  I ordered 38w for my potbelly and 28l for a comfortable sag.  Fits perfectly just like my Liberty overalls at the same size.  Heavy duty materials and good stitching and good zippers.  Should last a long time.

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.description: This End Point collects the complete data of any product on amazon.
